feed.title: Millenium Blades Wiki - Mini Expansion #11 (Extra Sets)

entry.title: Animal Princess (Expansion Mini Expansion #11 (Extra Sets))
entry.summary: Play: Gain all ANIMAL cards from opponents' hands and binders to your hand. Each opponent may give you one of their Friendship cards to prevent this effect from affecting them.
entry.content:
Animal Princess

Source Mini Expansion #11 (Extra Sets)
Set Princess Power
Cost $4
Card Type Expansion
Quantity
Star Rating 3⭐
Element Earth
Type Mage
Play: Gain all ANIMAL cards from opponents' hands and binders to your hand. Each opponent may give you one of their Friendship cards to prevent this effect from affecting them.
Source Symbol Collusion
References Brave, Merida. "T-Posing to assert dominance" meme in art. Five Nights at Freddies, Freddy Fazbear in art.
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2019
Count 1

entry.title: BattleStar (Premium Mini Expansion #11 (Extra Sets))
entry.summary: ACCESSORY | You have an additional slot for Accessories. | When you would lose a clash, flip this card. If you do, you do not lose that clash (this doesn't mean you win).

entry.title: Do You Wanna Build a Deck Box? (Expansion Mini Expansion #11 (Extra Sets))
entry.summary: DECK BOX | At the beginning of the Tournament, choose a player. You and that player attach a card with a Score effect from your hands to this card. This card gains the Score effects of the cards attached to this card.
